import React from 'react' import NewModal from '../../../UI/modal/modal' import Input from '../../../UI/input/Input.ui' import { Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' const UpdateCategoriesModal = (props) => { const { size, handleClose, modalTitle, expandedArray, checkedArray, handleCategoryInput, categoryList, show, } = props return (
Expanded
 {expandedArray.length > 0 && expandedArray.map((item, index) => ( handleCategoryInput('name', e.target.value, index, 'expanded') } /> ))}
Checked
 {checkedArray.length > 0 && checkedArray.map((item, index) => ( handleCategoryInput('name', e.target.value, index, 'checked') } /> ))} ) } export default UpdateCategoriesModal
